## ERROR TIPS

### Persistent Placement Issues (Updated)
- Distance violations (step 96) - Maintain <10 tile distance during all placement operations
- Entity collisions (steps 98,99,102,103,104) - Implement complete obstruction checks before placement
- Duplicate placements (step 103) - Verify tile emptiness before placing pipes/entities
- Water overlap errors (steps 105,106,108) - Check terrain type before placing entities near water
- Failed assertions (steps 107,109,110,111) - Validate placement conditions before asserting success

### Fluid System Problems (Updated)
- Connection failures (steps 100,101) - Verify clear path between all connection points
- Blocked pipe routes (steps 98,102) - Clear entire pipe path before placement attempts
- Orientation mismatches - Ensure all connection points face correct directions

### Construction Best Practices (Updated)
1. Maintain proper distance (<10 tiles) during placements
2. Implement complete obstruction checks before all constructions
3. Clear entire pipe routes before connection attempts
4. Verify tile emptiness before placing any entity
5. Check connection point orientations match
6. Test connections incrementally during complex builds
7. Validate fluid types match before connecting systems
8. Clear all obstructions along pipe routes before placement
9. Verify entity persistence before interaction attempts
10. Check connection point orientations match before connecting
11. Remove existing entities before replacement attempts
12. Verify inventory before all placement operations
13. Check terrain type (especially near water) before placement
14. Validate placement conditions before asserting success
15. Implement dry-land verification for power plant locations
